title: Ticket #3191: condor_q -jobads does not respect -constraint and similar
description:
condor_q -jobads does not respect -constraint.

It will always return all the classads in the provided file.
remarks:
2012-Aug-10 21:29:06 by sfiligoi:
Similar problem with the newly proposed -userlog.

2012-Aug-14 05:56:24 by matt:
Enhancing the -jobads argument on condor_q is less desirable than factoring this functionality properly into a tool that can, eventually, handle the multitude of data sources Condor provides. See #3188.
2012-Oct-22 14:59:59 by zmiller:
Bulk change of target version from v070901 to v070902 using ./ticket-target-mover.
attachments:
• queue.cpp.fix_jobads_constr.patch 6042 bytes added by sfiligoi on 2012-Aug-11 02:27:07 UTC.
    This patch fixes the problem, starting from master.

    It uses heavily boost, which if I understand correctly, is not recommended for v7_8. Else, it should work fine in v7_8-branch as well (not tested).

  • queue.cpp.fix_userlog_constr.patch 3702 bytes added by sfiligoi on 2012-Aug-13 23:58:01 UTC.
    Fix the problem for -userlog as well.

    Assumes the patched from #3188 have all been applied.
check_ins:
2012-Oct-22 10:06   Check-in [33712]: Version History for #3191, condor_q -jobads now respects -constraint (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
2012-Oct-19 15:46   Check-in [33710]: Version history for #3188 (also covers #3191). (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
2012-Aug-29 15:23   Check-in [33208]: move code that converts userlog to a set of job ads into condor_utils #3188 also implement -constraint for -jobads and -userlog in condor_q #3191 (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: sfiligoi
